text: Digaula ga wwolowwolo, “Nia daane o Israel! Goodou hagamaamaa ina gimaadou! Deenei taane dela e heehee i nia madagowaa huogodoo, e agoago gi nia daangada huogodoo, e hai baahi gi digau Israel mo Nnaganoho Moses, mo di Hale Daumaha deenei. Gei dolomeenei mee gu laha mai ana gau tuadimee gi lodo di Hale Daumaha, gei gu hagahuaidu di gowaa haga madagu deenei!”
